about_the_game:
Welcome to the Pangea: Dawn Demo, where you can experience the basic mechanics that will eventually make up the new single-player adventure RPG.

Pangea: Dawn challenges you to step into the role as your new clan's hero. On the primordial continent of Pangea, survival isn’t just about strength; it’s about wielding the raw power of nature itself. Unite a fractured clan and venture into a world where prehistoric giants and ancient forces test every ounce of your resolve. Forge alliances, tame wild beasts, and uncover untapped secrets that could transform your people into an unstoppable force. With every decision, shape the destiny of your tribe and secure your place in the legend of Pangea. The dawn of a new era awaits - will you rise to claim it?

Features of the first-look:
• Explore Pangea: Dawn's early encampment and the surrounding biome
• Wield weapons and fill your inventory
• Dispatch of wild creatures and savage foes with our early combat system

• Enter stealth mode to get the upper hand on threats, or sneak past undetected
• Interact with creatures from the Mount class
• Begin to immerse yourself in the world of Pangea as we continue to update the demo!
